test_cases.title: Create Standard Purchase Order - Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify that a procurement user can create a standard PO with all required fields.
preconditions: Vendor, material, plant master dATF exists
test_steps: Select vendor, material, quantity, price, plant, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: PO is saved, assigned a unique number, and no FI document is posted.

test_cases.title: Create PO - Missing Mandatory Field (Negative)
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents PO creation if a mandatory field (e.g., vendor) is missing.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents PO creation.

test_cases.title: Create PO - Boundary Quantity Value
test_cases.description: Verify PO creation with minimum allowed quantity.
test_steps: Enter vendor, material, price, plant, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: PO is saved successfully with quantity 1.

test_cases.title: Create PO - Price Edge Case
test_cases.description: Verify PO creation with zero price is not allowed.
test_steps: Enter vendor, material, quantity, plant, and delivery date
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents PO creation with zero price.

test_cases.title: Create PO - Compliance with Best Practices
test_cases.description: Verify PO creation follows SAP S/4HANA best practices with minimal customization.
preconditions: System configured for standard PO process
test_steps: Create a PO using standard SAP fields
test_cases.expected_results: PO is created using standard fields and process; no custom fields or logic present.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Release Strategy Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify PO is routed for approval based on release strategy and can be approved.
test_cases.expected_results: PO status changes to 'Approved'; approval history is recorded.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Unauthorized User Attempt
test_cases.description: Verify unauthorized user cannot approve PO.
preconditions: User does not have approval role
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents approval and displays error message.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Release Strategy Boundary Value
test_cases.description: Verify PO approval routing for PO value at threshold.
preconditions: PO created with value exactly at threshold
test_cases.expected_results: PO is routed to correct approver as per release strategy and approved.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Audit Trail Verification
test_cases.description: Verify approval history is recorded for audit purposes.
test_cases.expected_results: Approval history is visible with timestamp and user info.

test_cases.title: PO Approval - Attempt GR/IR on Unapproved PO
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents GR or IR posting for unapproved PO.
test_steps: Login as warehouse or AP user
Attempt to post GR or IR against unapproved PO
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks transaction and displays error.

test_cases.title: Post Goods Receipt - Full Receipt Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify warehouse user can post full GR against approved PO.
test_steps: Enter received quantity equal to PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Inventory/expense updated, FI document generated, GR/IR credited.

test_cases.title: Post Goods Receipt - Partial Receipt
test_cases.description: Verify warehouse user can post partial GR and system updates remaining quantity.
test_steps: Enter received quantity less than PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: Partial GR posted, remaining PO quantity updated, FI document generated.

test_cases.title: Post Goods Receipt - Over Receipt (Negative)
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents posting GR quantity greater than PO quantity.
test_steps: Enter received quantity greater than PO quantity
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents over-receipt.

test_cases.title: Post Goods Receipt - Traceability to PO
test_cases.description: Verify each GR is linked to original PO for traceability.
test_cases.expected_results: GR document displays PO reference.

test_cases.title: Post Goods Receipt - FI Document Generation
test_cases.description: Verify FI document is automatically generated upon GR posting.
test_steps: Search for document linked to GR
test_cases.expected_results: FI document exists and reflects correct accounts.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice - 3-Way Match Positive
test_cases.description: Verify invoice can be posted when PO, GR, and invoice match.
test_steps: Enter invoice details matching PO and GR
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice posted, FI document generated, 3-way match successful.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice - Price Difference Within Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify invoice is posted when price difference is within tolerance.
test_steps: Enter invoice with price slightly higher than PO (within tolerance)
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice posted, FI document generated, tolerance applied.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice - Price Difference Exceeds Tolerance (Negative)
test_cases.description: Verify invoice is blocked when price difference exceeds tolerance.
test_steps: Enter invoice with price much higher than PO (exceeds tolerance)
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice is blocked for payment, system notifies user.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice - Quantity Difference Within Tolerance
test_cases.description: Verify invoice is posted when quantity difference is within tolerance.
test_steps: Enter invoice for quantity slightly higher than GR (within tolerance)
test_cases.expected_results: Invoice posted, tolerance applied.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice - Blocked Invoice Review
test_cases.description: Verify blocked invoices are flagged and can be reviewed by AP user.
preconditions: Invoice blocked due to tolerance breach
test_cases.expected_results: Blocked invoice is visible, flagged, and details available for review.

test_cases.title: Post Vendor Invoice - Attempt Payment on Blocked Invoice (Negative)
test_cases.description: Verify payment processing is prevented for blocked invoices.
test_steps: Attempt to process payment for blocked invoice
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents payment and displays error.

test_cases.title: Automatic FI Posting - GR Transaction
test_cases.description: Verify FI document is generated automatically for GR posting.
test_steps: Check FI document list for GR transaction
test_cases.expected_results: FI document exists, correct accounts posted, real-time update.

test_cases.title: Automatic FI Posting - IR Transaction
test_cases.description: Verify FI document is generated automatically for IR posting.
test_steps: Check FI document list for IR transaction
test_cases.expected_results: FI document exists, correct accounts posted, real-time update.

test_cases.title: Automatic FI Posting - No Manual Intervention
test_cases.description: Verify no manual FI posting is required for standard P2P transactions.
test_steps: Review FI postings for PO, GR, IR
test_cases.expected_results: All postings are automatic; no manual intervention needed.

test_cases.title: Automatic GR/IR Clearing on Invoice Posting
test_cases.description: Verify GR/IR account is cleared automatically when invoice is posted.
test_steps: Review GR/IR account before and after invoice posting
test_cases.expected_results: GR/IR account is cleared, clearing entries reflected in FI document.

test_cases.title: Manual Clearing of GR/IR Prevented
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents manual clearing of GR/IR for standard transactions.
test_steps: Attempt manual clearing of GR/IR account
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents manual clearing and displays error.

test_cases.title: GR/IR Open Items Reporting
test_cases.description: Verify open GR/IR items are tracked and reported.
test_cases.expected_results: Report displays open GR/IR items by PO and vendor.

test_cases.title: Vendor Liability Posting on Invoice Receipt
test_cases.description: Verify vendor liabilities are posted automatically during invoice receipt.
test_steps: Check vendor account balances after invoice posting
test_cases.expected_results: Vendor account updated in real time, liability posted as per standards.

test_cases.title: Vendor Liability Posting - Compliance Check
test_cases.description: Verify liability postings comply with company accounting standards.
test_steps: Review FI document for vendor liability posting
test_cases.expected_results: Liability posted to correct GL account as per policy.

test_cases.title: Vendor Balance Visibility in Reports
test_cases.description: Verify vendor balances are visible in standard reports.
test_cases.expected_results: Report displays updated vendor balances.

test_cases.title: View PO History - All Events Displayed
test_cases.description: Verify system displays all PO-related activities in history.
preconditions: PO created, approved, GR and IR posted
test_cases.expected_results: All events (creation, approval, GR, IR) displayed with timestamp and user info.

test_cases.title: View PO History - Audit Access
test_cases.description: Verify PO history is accessible for audit purposes.
test_cases.expected_results: PO history is accessible and includes all required details for audit.

test_cases.title: View GR and Invoice Status - Real-Time Update
test_cases.description: Verify GR and IR status for PO is updated in real time.
test_steps: Login as procurement or finance user
test_cases.expected_results: Status reflects current GR and IR, updated in real time.

test_cases.title: View GR and Invoice Status - Blocked Invoice Indication
test_cases.description: Verify blocked invoices are clearly indicated in PO status.
test_steps: Login as procurement or finance user
test_cases.expected_results: Blocked invoice is clearly flagged in status view.

test_cases.title: View GR/IR Balances Report
test_cases.description: Verify system provides report of open GR/IR balances by PO and vendor.
test_cases.expected_results: Report displays open balances by PO and vendor, real-time dATF.

test_cases.title: GR/IR Balances - Period Close Highlight
test_cases.description: Verify balances outside tolerance are highlighted at period close.
test_cases.expected_results: Balances outside tolerance are flagged for action.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access - Procurement User
test_cases.description: Verify procurement user can access only procurement functions.
test_steps: Attempt to access procurement, warehouse, AP, and finance functions
test_cases.expected_results: User can access only procurement functions; others are restricted.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access - Unauthorized Access Attempt
test_cases.description: Verify unauthorized access attempts are logged.
test_cases.expected_results: Access denied, attempt logged in audit trail.

test_cases.title: Role Assignment Management
test_cases.description: Verify role assignments can be managed by authorized administrators.
test_steps: Assign or revoke roles for users
test_cases.expected_results: Role assignments updated, changes logged.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties - Prevent PO and Invoice by Same User
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents single user from creating PO and posting invoice.
test_steps: Attempt to post invoice for same PO
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents invoice posting by same user.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties - Conflicting Role Assignment
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents assignment of conflicting roles to same user.
test_steps: Attempt to assign both procurement and AP roles to same user
test_cases.expected_results: System blocks conflicting role assignment and logs attempt.

test_cases.title: Segregation of Duties - Audit Log Verification
test_cases.description: Verify audit logs are maintained for all role assignments and changes.
test_cases.expected_results: Audit logs show all changes with timestamp and user info.

test_cases.title: FI Posting - Use of Correct GL Accounts
test_cases.description: Verify FI postings use correct GL accounts as per company policy.
test_cases.expected_results: FI postings use correct GL accounts.

test_cases.title: FI Posting - Mandatory Fields Validation
test_cases.description: Verify system enforces mandatory fields and validation checks for FI postings.
test_steps: Attempt to post FI document with missing mandatory field
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents posting and displays error.

test_cases.title: FI Posting - Traceability to Source Transaction
test_cases.description: Verify all FI postings are traceable to source P2P transactions.
test_cases.expected_results: FI document includes reference to source transaction.

test_cases.title: FI Posting - Accounting Standards Configurability
test_cases.description: Verify accounting standards are configurable and updATFble in system.
test_cases.expected_results: Accounting standards updated and applied to new postings.

test_cases.title: Real-Time Integration - No Batch Jobs Required
test_cases.description: Verify all GR and IR postings are reflected in FI without batch jobs.
test_steps: Check FI postings immediately after GR/IR
test_cases.expected_results: FI postings are visible in real time; no batch jobs required.

test_cases.title: Real-Time Integration - Integration Error Notification
test_cases.description: Verify system notifies users of any P2P-FI integration errors.
test_steps: Trigger GR or IR posting with error (e.g., missing GL account)
test_cases.expected_results: System notifies user of integration error.

test_cases.title: Master DATF Creation - Positive Flow
test_cases.description: Verify new vendor, material, and GL account master dATF can be created.
preconditions: User has master dATF specialist role
test_steps: Navigate to vendor, material, and GL account creation screens
test_cases.expected_results: Master dATF records created and available for use.

test_cases.title: Master DATF Creation - Duplicate Entry Prevention
test_cases.description: Verify system prevents creation of duplicate master dATF entries.
test_steps: Attempt to create vendor/material/GL account with existing key
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents duplicate entry and displays error.

test_cases.title: Master DATF Creation - Validation of Completeness
test_cases.description: Verify system validates completeness and accuracy of master dATF records.
preconditions: User has master dATF specialist role
test_steps: Enter incomplete dATF for vendor/material/GL account
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error and prevents saving incomplete record.

test_cases.title: Track Procurement and Financial Impact - Dashboard Display
test_cases.description: Verify system provides dashboard showing procurement and FI dATF side by side.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard displays real-time procurement and FI dATF.

test_cases.title: Track Procurement and Financial Impact - Drill Down
test_cases.description: Verify users can drill down to transaction details from dashboard/report.
test_cases.expected_results: User can view detailed transaction dATF.

test_cases.title: Track Procurement and Financial Impact - Export Report
test_cases.description: Verify reports are exportable for further analysis.
test_steps: Export report to Excel or PDF
test_cases.expected_results: Report is exported successfully.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close - Alert Generation
test_cases.description: Verify system generates alerts for open GR/IR balances at period close.
preconditions: GR/IR balances exist at period close
test_cases.expected_results: System generates alert for open GR/IR balances.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close - User Action Required
test_cases.description: Verify balances outside tolerance require user action before period close.
preconditions: GR/IR balances outside tolerance at period close
test_cases.expected_results: System requires user action for flagged balances before period close.

test_cases.title: No Open GR/IR Balances at Period Close - Reconciliation Report
test_cases.description: Verify GR/IR reconciliation report is available for period-end review.
test_cases.expected_results: Report displays all open and cleared GR/IR balances for review.

summary: 57 comprehensive test cases have been generated, covering positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for all user stories and requirements in the SAP S/4HANA P2P process. All key functionalities, controls, and reporting aspects are thoroughly tested for end-to-end process integrity and compliance.
